ygData.subject: Gemcutter ideas
ygData.msgSnippet: Here s just a couple of thoughts I had last night. Keep in mind it was 4AM and I was running on nothing but Mountain Dew so if they sound ridiculous please
ygData.messageBody:
Here's just a couple of thoughts I had last night. Keep in mind it was 4AM
and I was running on nothing but Mountain Dew so if they sound ridiculous
please forgive me. :)

1. Has anyone tried right clicking the gemcutter on a metal bar? I know it
doesn't make any sense to use something called a GEM cutter on a metal bar,
but this is Verant we're talking about after all.

2. An expensive possibility but has anyone tried putting a gemcutter and a
gem(probably a pearl judging by the recipe book) in a jeweler's kit without
a metal bar and seeing what happens?
